title: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
description: When previewing a report and clicking the Show Report Parameters button, the default values for the parameters are not displayed in the value boxes. This prevents me from easily modifying the parameter values without manually entering all the values again.
OB: When I preview the report and click the Show Report Parameters button, the value boxes for the parameters are empty.
EB: When I preview the report and click the Show Report Parameters button, the value boxes for the parameters should display the default values.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create several report parameters. 2. Set default values for these parameters. 3. Drag them to the Layout.
